title: COVID-128
description: "Surprise! I wrote a new Lunar Chronicles short story, inspired by the prompt from @fiercereads asking what our characters would be doing during a time of social distancing. It was really fun for me to hang out with these characters again for a little while, and I hope you'll enjoy it!"Find the story on the May 20, 2020 Fierce Reads blog.
author: Marissa Meyer
